title: deivam tuNai
sahitya:
deivam tuNai arivIr elvaghaiyilum shivakAmi maNALanAm sabhApati


anupallavi

  poi vaLarnda vinai aimpulan vAdanai puriyum indra jAla uyir vAzhvil para


caraNam    sukha dukkhamum kalandirukkum muDivil dukkhamE minjiyirukkum inda
 jagamEl jananamum maraNamum tunbam sankaTam idait-tIrttu aruL sheyya namakku
